Label: HEL2_6SEC_NESSMAG - Mariani/Ness (University of Rome, CNR/Istituto Fisica Interplanetario, and NASA/GSFC)
PiAffiliation: University of Rome, CNR/Istituto Fisica Interplanetario, and NASA/GSFC

VariableDescription.Name: BXSSE
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         Helios
#     SOURCE_NAME                     HELIOS>Helios
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Interplanetary Studies
#     DATA_TYPE                       6SEC>High Time Resolution 6sec
#     DESCRIPTOR                      NESSMAG>Magnetometer ness
#     DATA_VERSION                    1
#     PI_NAME                         Mariani/Ness
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  University of Rome, CNR/Istituto Fisica Interplanetario, and NASA/GSFC
#     TEXT                            This dataset contains high resolution interplanetary magnetic field data in                            
#     TEXT                             six-second averages as measured by the Helios 1 tri-axial fluxgate magnetometer                       
#     TEXT                             experiment. Magnetic field vector components in nanotelsa [nT] are given in                           
#     TEXT                             solar-ecliptic (SE) spacecraft-centered coordinates with one file for each                            
#     TEXT                             day.  The magnetic field magnitude and standard deviations of the vector components                   
#                                      are also included.                                                                                    
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Magnetic Fields (space)
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Helios
#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  hel2_6sec_nessmag
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 hel2_6sec_nessmag_00000000_v01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      HEL2_6SEC_NESSMAG
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 6 second
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Default time
#  2. Bx (SSE)
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 19:43:30 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. Bx (SSE)
#
EPOCH                        BX_(SSE)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms             nT
17-01-1976 07:34:06.000       4.77000
